review: I'm gonna start by saying that i don't live in the US. I will also mention that as a direct result i cannot use most of the features of this device. No Amazon Video, no Hulu, no HBO or Showtime. No Pandora or Amazon Music. This thing is solely for Netflix, Youtube, Vimeo, TuneIn and the handful of entertaining apps i am allowed to install or use. But these apps don't work perfectly either, just well enough. Netflix has a weird audio sync issue with its programming. Youtube has it as well. Sound is delayed by .5 to 1 second. There are no instructions on what i should tweak on my TV if its a compatability issue.Pros:●The wifi works well●Apps load and work really fast●Remote ontrol is responsive enough to play a few games really well●setup was a breezeCons:○Regional restrictions on content (even on Amazon created content)○Annoying sound synchronisation issues.○Sleep function is hidden away in submenu○Lack of a digital manual (or do I need to look again? I may have missed it)

review: This is a terrible product. It constantly disconnects from my home wifi network causing disruptions in my viewing experience. My google chromecast never disconnects and works so much better. I was so excited to use this product, but I would discourage others from buying it until they correct its issues dropping its network connection. Google amazon fire tv stick drops wifi connection and take a look at everyone having the same issues. Don't buy this product until Amazon can figure out a solution to this.
